department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Semi-circular pendant may suggest a fish form-indication of fin raised edge on inner side of the semi-circular band simple strokes of line, incised on both sides, identical design two pendant perforations, one at each end of the pendant. Calcified ivory jade (partially translucent) traces of red pigment and clay like substance.
medium: Highly calcified ivory jade with traces of red pigment
title: Fish Pendant
